description:
Breathable with non-slip gel, this knee sleeve conforms to the shape of your knee for high-level support, while still allowing for full range of motion. Recommended for indications of tendinitis, patellar (knee cap) pain/tracking, arthritis, minor soft tissue tears/strains and general knee pain.

  • For sizing, measure the circumference just above your patella
  • Small fits circumference of 33–35.6cm
  • Medium fits 35.6–40.6cm
  • Large fits 40.6–45.7cm
  • Extra-large fits 45.7–20.8cm
name: Pro-Tec Athletics 3D Flat Knee Sleeve
